title: Calories in Costco Cheese Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in cheese pizza costco per slice, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your diet tracking.
assumptions: Standard Costco food court 18-inch cheese pizza slice (1/6 of whole), baked with mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, and wheat crust.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact preparation, slice size, and location; values based on average reported data. Check Costco nutrition info when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Costco cheese pizza contains 710 calories and 34 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Vegetarian with extra veggies (e.g., peppers, onions) per slice

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Costco cheese pizza?
What are the macros for calories in cheese pizza costco?
faqs.a: Per slice: 92 g carbs, 34 g protein, 24 g fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in a whole Costco cheese pizza?
faqs.a: About 4260 calories for the full 18-inch pizza (6 slices).

faqs.q: Is Costco cheese pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has around 1230 mg sodium due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in cheese pizza costco?
faqs.a: Standard baked; added oil or thicker crust can increase calories by 50-100 per slice.
